ingredients.description: Whole grain oats are the seeds of the oat plant, eaten as a cereal grain. They are a good source of fiber and nutrients.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: Sugar is a sweet, crystalline carbohydrate used as a sweetener in food and drinks.  It is primarily sucrose, extracted from sugarcane or sugar beets.

ingredients.name: Corn Syrup
ingredients.description: Corn syrup is a sweetener made from the starch of corn.  It's often used in processed foods and beverages.

ingredients.name: Palm Oil

ingredients.name: Cocoa Powder

ingredients.name: Whey Protein Concentrate

ingredients.name: Skim Milk
ingredients.description: Skim milk is cow's milk with most of the fat removed. It's a source of protein and calcium.

ingredients.name: Soy Lecithin

ingredients.name: Salt

ingredients.name: Natural Flavors

ingredients.name: Artificial Flavors

ingredients.name: Milk

ingredients.name: E951
ingredients.description: Aspartame (E951) is an artificial sweetener used in many foods and beverages.
